name: Seiko's Closet
description:
The first game of Our Odyssey Production Studios. 

Seiko Nightly is a young college sophomore with a love for art and comics. Her biggest hurdle right now, though, is her ability to talk to others. She wants to make friends and lasting bonds, but can’t find the courage to do so. On top of that, her overbearing mother constantly calls her, trying to convince her that her passion for art won’t lead to a successful future. Feeling like she can’t stand up to anyone in her life these anxieties start manifesting as psychic abilities she doesn’t quite understand. She starts having strange dreams and feels the closet in her dorm room calling out to her at night. When she finally decides to take a step inside, she’ll have to face her inner demons if she wants to stand up for herself.
